articles.title: Asia Cup, Super 4s: Sri Lanka remain in contention with 21-run win over Bangladesh - Times of India
articles.description: Samarawickrama scored a brilliant 93 before Sri Lanka bowlers rallied to beat Bangladesh by 21 runs in their Asia Cup Super 4 match in Colombo. Invite

articles.title: The Goodfellas in Asia Cup: Shaheen Afridi, Naseem Shah, & Haris Rauf with the 90’s nostalgia - The Indian Express
articles.description: It was Wasim Akram, Waqar Younis, and Shoaib Akhtar then who terrorised the world. Now, another pack of three are hunting down the batsmen around the world.

articles.title: Asia Cup: India face Pakistan with Rahul, Bumrah, weather on the agenda - Hindustan Times
articles.description: The keeper-batter's return after a long injury layoff and the pace spearhead's first spell in an ODI for 14 months will be India's big focus. | Cricket
